name: Portuguese Chicken & Veggie Kebabs

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breast or firm tofu

preparation: Cut chicken into 1" cubes. Place in bowl; add dry glaze and oil. Stir to evenly coat. If you have extra time, let stand for 10 min to marinate.
Thread meat and vegetables onto 12" metal skewers.
Place skewers on grill; rotate often until lightly charred and chicken is cooked through, 12â€“15 min.
tips: Consider using safflower oil or avocado oil when grilling instead of olive oil. Olive oil has a lower smoke point so it breaks down and burns faster, creating a bitter taste.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 pita, 1 cup fresh veggies, 1 tbsp prepared Epicure dip.
